alert.note: Alert for Carver; Dakota; Hennepin; Scott (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 9:25PM CDT until May 26 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Rum River near St. Francis affecting Anoka County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota and Wisconsin... Minnesota River at Savage affecting Dakota, Carver, Scott and Hennepin Counties. Sauk River at St. Cloud affecting Stearns County. Mississippi River near Hastings L/D 2 affecting Dakota, Washington, Pierce and Goodhue Counties. Minnesota River At New Ulm affecting Brown, Blue Earth and Nicollet Counties. Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. Crow River at Rockford affecting Wright and Hennepin Counties. .Cool and relatively dry weather will settle across the region, and no significant rainfall is expected for at least the next several days. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River at Savage. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 702.0 feet, Barge loading stops at Port Cargill, and other flood prevention measures are begun. Water begins to impact Black Dog Road in Burnsville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 900 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 702.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 702.7 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 702.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
